sentences.english: Beaverton's % Mayor Doyle wants refugee and immigrant leaders to participate in the town's decision-making.
sentences.chinese: 比弗頓市長道爾希望難民和移民領袖參與本市的決策。

sentences.english: Deputy Mayor He Jihua meets with principal members of Kagoshima Cultural Exchange Group.
sentences.chinese: 市長何寄華會見鹿兒島文化藝術交流團的主要成員。

sentences.english: The mayor is so popular that he has the whole town under his thumb.
sentences.chinese: 市長如此深得人心，全城人都聽他的。

sentences.english: He was right, of course, to avoid the mayoralty trap.
sentences.chinese: 當然，他躲開了市長這個圈套倒是正確的。

sentences.english: Some time afterwards, M. Madeleine was appointed mayor.
sentences.chinese: 過些日子，馬德蘭先生被任命爲市長。

sentences.english: On a rainy day, Mayor Bloomberg opened the show with these words.
sentences.chinese: 圈”，市長布隆伯格打開這些話的節目。

sentences.english: But that isn't something worth celebrating, at least not for Chinese mayors.
sentences.chinese: 可惜這並不值得慶祝，至少對於中國的市長們是如此。

sentences.english: Guangzhou Mayor Li Zhiliu with Mr. Hong.
sentences.chinese: 廣州市長黎子流和康律師。

sentences.english: Where is Monsieur le Maire going?
sentences.chinese: 市長先生到什麼地方去呢？

sentences.english: Deputy Mayor of Yingkou municipal government.
sentences.chinese: 營口市人民政府副市長。

sentences.english: Sobyanin confirmed as new Moscow mayor.
sentences.chinese: 普京副手索比亞寧接任莫斯科市長。

sentences.english: The man threw leaflets for a write-in campaign for mayor before police pulled him up and arrested him.
sentences.chinese: 這名男子一直在朝下扔傳單，爲市長的競選活動造勢。

sentences.english: The mayor was criticized for his indecisiveness.
sentences.chinese: 市長的優柔寡斷受到了批評。

sentences.english: The 54-year-old had promised during the campaign to serve out his term as mayor.
sentences.chinese: 當年54歲的朱立倫在競選中承諾將服滿市長任期。

sentences.english: And as for 15 years, rice at permanent residents, the acclaimed by the mayor.
sentences.chinese: 又擔任拉賴因堡15年常任市長，深受市民的擁戴。

sentences.english: In a delicate exercise, charities are trying to present their agenda without usurping the mayor.
sentences.chinese: 慈善機構正在不篡奪市長權力的前提下，盡力想方案。

definition: head of a (government etc) department/section chief/section head/secretary/minister/CL:個|个[ge4],位[wei4],名[ming2]
to make a speech/to make some remarks
